interview.title: Interview
interview.question: Question
interview.recordingSaved: Your answer has been saved (video and audio)
interview.interviewCompletedDesc: Your answers have been successfully saved.
interview.waitingDescription: Please wait while the next question is being prepared...
interview.preparingDescription: Please wait while the system is being prepared...

personalIntroduction.title: Personal Introduction
personalIntroduction.description: Please introduce yourself and talk about your work experience and education. (Maximum 2 minutes)

motivation.title: Motivation and Interest
motivation.description: Why are you interested in this job/position and what makes you suitable for this role? (Maximum 2 minutes)

challengingExperience.title: Challenging Experience
challengingExperience.description: Tell us about a challenging problem you faced at work or in your studies and how you solved it. (Maximum 3 minutes)

permissions.title: Camera and Microphone Access
permissions.description: To start the interview, you need access to camera and microphone. These permissions are used for recording video and audio during the interview.
permissions.cameraDescription: For recording video during the interview
permissions.microphoneDescription: For recording audio during the interview
permissions.separateRecording: Both video and audio are recorded and saved separately
permissions.accessErrorDesc: Please connect your camera and try again.
permissions.accessCancelledDesc: You need camera and microphone access to start the interview.

notes.saveDesc: Your note has been successfully saved

errors.recordingStartDesc: There was a problem starting the recording
errors.recordingStopDesc: There was a problem stopping the recording

home.title: Interview Description
home.description1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
home.description2: Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
home.description3: Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.
home.interviewCompleted: Your interview has been completed successfully
home.resultNotification: Results will be notified to you as soon as possible
